DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of reactive neuromuscular training on muscular endurance test.
DOC.brief_title: Reactive Neuromuscular Training Effects on Side Bridge Endurance Test
DOC.criteria: Healthy participants with no history of balance problems, ages 20 â€“ 40. 1. Lower extremity injury, surgery, visual, or vestibular condition that would effect balance? 2. Unstable joints of the lower extremity infections, injuries or other malignancies affecting the lower extremity?
DOC.keyword: Rehabilitation, Side Bridge test, Muscular endurance
